   contain the root `toctree` directive.

pyclustkit documentation
========================

Welcome to the documentation for puclustkit, a library developed for rapid calculation of a plethora of internal CVI,
and the extraction of various state-of-the-art meta-features for algorithm selection in clustering.

Installation
-----------------
Pyclustkit can be installed through pypi with

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install pyclustkit

Otherwise you can also:

* download a demo of this library built with gradio through `here <https://example.com>`_ .
* Visit the `GitHub Repository <https://example.com>`_ to download the source code. 


Citing this work
-----------------
If you use this library in your project or research please consider citing it with the following citation
"---- Pyclust: a framework"
